verbs.description: " [ARG1: No job] [V: was] [ARG2: too great] ; no job was too small , " President Donald Trump said . " ( Allan ) was always there for anybody that needed him . "
" No job was too great ; [ARG1: no job] [V: was] [ARG2: too small] , " President Donald Trump said . " ( Allan ) was always there for anybody that needed him . "
" [ARG1: No job was too great ; no job was too small] , " [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] . " ( [C-ARG1: Allan ) was always there for anybody that needed him] . "
" No job was too great ; no job was too small , " President Donald Trump said . " ( [ARG1: Allan] [ARGM-ADV: )] [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: always] [ARG2: there] [ARGM-GOL: for anybody that needed him] . "
" No job was too great ; no job was too small , " President Donald Trump said . " ( Allan ) was always there for [ARG0: anybody] [R-ARG0: that] [V: needed] [ARG1: him] . "
